snippet.title: Quite a Ride: Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
As the developers describe it, and you'll see from the trailer, "Quite a Ride is a survival horror game with a unique twist—you traverse a rural landscape on a bicycle, relying on pedaling to keep your smartphone charged. If the battery dies, the unnatural mist surrounding you will consume you." Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3166050/Quite_a_Ride/

#IGN #Gaming
